'''Teāna''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A seasoned Huana woman rests her elbow on the drum like it's the only thing keeping her upright. She pats the hide skin, the percussion no more effortful than a sigh.}}
Teana is the village's drummer. Apart from music, she also takes care of signaling and watches the horizon for ships, informing the village of their arrival. She is a Mataru, though she neither hunts nor fights due to a nasty accident that left her with a scar running down the left side of her face and neck and rendered her mute.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* You can earn a Moderate Positive reputation with [Tikawara](/tikawara/) by playing on the drum with her (Major Positive for [Chanter](/chanter/)).
}}
[Category:Tikawara characters](/categoryTikawaraCharacters/)
